headline: Western Digital Innovation Day Puts AI Storage Growth Story In Focus
summary: Western Digital (NasdaqGS:WDC) is hosting its Innovation Day on February 3 to outline its AI focused storage roadmap. The event follows strong quarterly results that featured progress in next generation storage technologies. The company recently secured long term agreements with major customers and raised its dividend. Management is emphasizing long term structural growth tied to the data economy and AI workloads. Western Digital enters Innovation Day with its share price at $250.23 and a...
